alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Addison and southwestern Chittenden Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weybridge, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Vergennes, Ferrisburg, Cornwall, Charlotte, Weybridge, Waltham, Bristol, Monkton Ridge, Monkton, Monkton Boro, New Haven, Ferrisburgh, Mt. Philo State Park, Hinesburg, Salisbury, Starksboro, Bridport, Panton, and Addison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
